features.title: Platform Features & Roadmap
features.subtitle: Comprehensive features for civic education and democratic participation in Bangladesh

categories.coreDesc: Essential features currently implemented in the platform
categories.enhancedDesc: Planned features to improve user experience and engagement
categories.advancedDesc: Future innovations for comprehensive civic empowerment

core.voterEducationDesc: Complete modules on voting eligibility, registration process, NID information, voter rights, EVM usage, and first-time voter guides with bilingual support
core.civicServicesDesc: Step-by-step guides for NID services, passport, birth registration, healthcare, RTI requests, and social safety nets with helpline numbers
core.rightsDesc: Educational content on constitutional rights, democratic duties, legal protections, and civic responsibilities of citizens
core.misinformationDesc: AI-powered fact-checking tool that analyzes text and images to identify false information about elections and civic matters
core.searchDesc: Comprehensive search functionality to find educational content across all modules quickly

enhanced.audioNarrationDesc: Full audio support in Bangla and English for all content, making the platform accessible to low-literacy users and visually impaired citizens
enhanced.aiChatbotDesc: Conversational AI assistant to answer questions about voting, government services, and civic rights in real-time with multilingual support
enhanced.videoTutorialsDesc: Step-by-step video guides demonstrating government service processes, voting procedures, and civic participation with Bangla narration
enhanced.digitalStoriesDesc: Engaging, regionally localized stories about democratic participation, voting experiences, and civic success stories to inspire citizens
enhanced.progressTrackingDesc: Gamified learning paths, completion tracking, and achievement badges to motivate continued civic education
enhanced.notificationsDesc: Personalized alerts for election dates, document renewal deadlines, new content, and important civic announcements

advanced.offlineModeDesc: Download educational content for offline access, crucial for rural areas with limited internet connectivity
advanced.voiceSearchDesc: Voice-activated search and navigation in Bangla and English for hands-free accessibility and low-literacy support
advanced.pollingStationsDesc: GPS-based finder to locate nearest polling stations with directions, accessibility information, and crowd estimates
advanced.communityDesc: Moderated community space for citizens to ask questions, share experiences, and help each other with civic processes
advanced.socialSharingDesc: Share educational content, fact-checks, and civic achievements on social platforms to spread awareness
advanced.volunteerDesc: Connect citizens with election observation opportunities, civic volunteering, and grassroots democracy initiatives
advanced.analyticsDesc: Transparent dashboard showing platform reach, learning outcomes, regional engagement, and democratic participation impact

competitive.title: Competitive Advantages for Democracy
competitive.description: What makes AmarVote Pathshala a comprehensive solution for civic education in Bangladesh
competitive.innovationDesc: First platform in Bangladesh using AI for misinformation detection and civic education assistance
competitive.accessibilityDesc: Designed for low-literacy users, rural communities, and marginalized citizens with audio, video, and visual-first design
competitive.impactDesc: Focused on strengthening democratic participation ahead of 2026 elections with transparent analytics and community reach
